roadmaps.title: Modern SQL Roadmap
roadmaps.description: A future-proof path to mastering SQLâ€”from foundational querying to cloud-scale analytics, data modeling, and AI-integrated workflows.

beginner.description: Understand core database concepts and where SQL fits in modern data stacks.
Work with modern data types including semi-structured formats.
Retrieve and sort data from single tables.
Precisely filter data using logical and pattern-based conditions.
Improve readability and avoid ambiguity in queries.
Summarize data for reporting and analysis.
Create grouped summaries and hierarchical aggregations.

intermediate.description: Design normalized tables with integrity constraints.

concepts: INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL OUTER JOIN
intermediate.description: Combine data across multiple tables efficiently.
Break complex logic into readable, modular components.
Merge or compare result sets from multiple queries.
Safely modify data in transactional and analytical systems.
Enforce data integrity at the database level.
Add branching logic directly in SQL.

concepts: String: CONCAT, SUBSTR, TRIM, LENGTH, UPPER/LOWER, SPLIT
Date/Time: CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, DATE_TRUNC, EXTRACT, DATE_DIFF, INTERVAL
Math: ROUND, CEIL, FLOOR, ABS, RAND
intermediate.description: Manipulate strings, dates, numbers, and semi-structured data.

advanced.description: Solve hierarchical and iterative problems (e.g., org charts, bill of materials).

concepts: PARTITION BY, ORDER BY in windows
advanced.description: Perform calculations across related rows without collapsing groups.
Diagnose and optimize slow queries using execution plans.
Abstract complexity and precompute expensive queries.
Ensure data consistency in multi-user environments.
Encapsulate reusable logic in the database.
Automate actions on data changes (use sparingly in analytics).
Balance normalization for OLTP vs denormalization for OLAP.
Query modern data formats without rigid schemas.
Manage intermediate data during complex transformations.
Reshape data for reporting and dashboards.
Analyze temporal and spatial data patterns.

expert.description: Adopt analytics engineering best practices using the modern data stack.
Leverage cloud-native features for scalability and cost control.
Optimize large-scale analytical queries in cloud environments.
Implement enterprise-grade security and compliance.
Track data flow and ensure reliability in production pipelines.
Query data across systems without centralizing storage.
Integrate AI/ML workflows directly into SQL pipelines.
Treat SQL as production code with testing and automation.

beginner.description: Store and manipulate different kinds of data.

intermediate.description: Store and organize data efficiently.

Build complex programs using real-world modeling concepts.
Write concise, efficient data-processing code.

advanced.description: Speed up tasks with parallel processing and thread management.
Design scalable and maintainable applications using proven patterns.
Enhance functions with reusable logic.
Create iterators that save memory.
Manage resources safely and automatically.
Write code that manipulates code.
Understand and optimize Python's memory usage.

expert.description: Track application behavior and debug production issues.
Identify performance bottlenecks and write efficient code.
Fetch and process data from web APIs for automation and data pipelines.
Extend Python with C code for performance.
Scale Python applications across multiple machines.
Comprehensive ecosystem for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.
Ensure code quality and reliability through comprehensive testing.

roadmaps.title: Power BI Roadmap
roadmaps.description: A modern, comprehensive guide to mastering Power BI within Microsoft Fabric for data visualization, AI-driven insights, and enterprise-scale business intelligence.

beginner.description: Understand Power BI's role within Microsoft Fabric and its place in modern business intelligence.

Understand how to load and preview data before modeling.

intermediate.description: Structure your data model for optimal performance and intuitive analysis.

Perform aggregations and logic-based operations using foundational DAX.
Create time-based metrics like YOY, QoQ, and YTD analysis.
Clean, reshape, and consolidate data from multiple sources.

Create dynamic, presentation-ready reports.
Combine real-time and historical data efficiently for large datasets.

advanced.description: Write powerful, context-sensitive DAX measures for complex business logic.
Secure data access based on user identity or role.
Improve report responsiveness and reduce resource consumption.
Enhance reports with third-party or custom visuals responsibly.

Enable intuitive navigation through dimensional data.
Maintain consistent visual identity across reports.
Manage the report lifecycle like a software project with version control and staged deployment.

expert.description: Operate Power BI at scale within Microsoft Fabric's unified analytics platform.
Leverage AI to accelerate report creation, exploration, and insight generation.
Use the next-generation analytics engine for high-speed, large-scale data analysis.
Centralize and reuse data transformations across semantic models using cloud-native dataflows.
Securely connect cloud-based Power BI to on-premises data sources.
Collaborate and distribute insights across Microsoft 365 and custom apps.
Add workflow automation and app integration to your analytics solutions.

Go beyond dashboards with automated, AI-powered data exploration.
Enable business users to query data using natural language.
